atomic_tests.name: Enumeration for Credentials in Registry
atomic_tests.description: Queries to enumerate for credentials in the Registry. Upon execution, any registry key containing the word "password" will be displayed.

executor.name: command_prompt
executor.command:
reg query HKLM /f password /t REG_SZ /s
reg query HKCU /f password /t REG_SZ /s

atomic_tests.name: Enumeration for PuTTY Credentials in Registry
atomic_tests.description:
Queries to enumerate for PuTTY credentials in the Registry. PuTTY must be installed for this test to work. If any registry
entries are found, they will be displayed.
